message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $13,500, which represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for a limited time only. We trust that you will find this proposition attractive and hope to hear back from you soon.
